subject: Frank joins Apollo + Fastener Pack
body:
Team,

Please add Frank as Electrical Engineer on Apollo effective 2025-08-22. Also add Part P-5005 "Fastener Pack" qty=50 to Apollo.

Graph-impact:
- WORKS_ON(Frank→Apollo): role=Electrical Engineer, since=2025-08-22, valid_from=2025-08-22
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-5005): qty=50, valid_from=2025-08-22

— Erin

subject: Hermes now ACTIVE
body:
Switch Project Hermes status from planned to active as of 2025-08-22.

Graph-impact:
- Project(Hermes): status=active

— Erin

subject: Collab: Carol ↔ Frank on sensor harness
body:
Starting a focused collaboration with Frank on the sensor harness routing.

Graph-impact:
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Carol↔Frank): context="sensor harness", valid_from=2025-08-23

— Carol

subject: Increase Control Board qty to 4
body:
Please bump Control Board (P-3003) from 3 to 4 units.

Graph-impact:
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-3003): close previous (valid_to=2025-08-24)
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-3003): qty=4, valid_from=2025-08-24

— Bob

subject: Hermes depends on Zephyr
body:
For analytics ETL, please note Hermes depends on Zephyr artifacts.

Graph-impact:
- DEPENDS_ON(Hermes→Zephyr): valid_from=2025-08-24

— Ivan

subject: Grace joins Apollo (QA)
body:
Add Grace as QA on Apollo effective 2025-08-25.

Graph-impact:
- WORKS_ON(Grace→Apollo): role=QA Engineer, since=2025-08-25, valid_from=2025-08-25

— Alice

subject: Collab: Bob ↔ Grace for test planning
body:
Kick off test planning collaboration.

Graph-impact:
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Bob↔Grace): context="test planning", valid_from=2025-08-25

— Alice

subject: Adjust Sensor Kit qty to 3
body:
Supply constraint: reduce P-4004 Sensor Kit from 4 to 3 units.

Graph-impact:
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-4004): close previous (valid_to=2025-08-26)
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-4004): qty=3, valid_from=2025-08-26

— Erin

subject: Mounting design v1 complete; start v2
body:
Close the v1 collaboration and open v2 with the same folks.

Graph-impact:
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Carol↔Dave "mounting design v1"): valid_to=2025-08-26
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Carol↔Dave): context="mounting design v2", valid_from=2025-08-26

— Bob

subject: Add Cooling Fan (P-6006) qty=2
body:
Thermal margins are tight; add a new part.

Graph-impact:
- Create Part node: P-6006 "Cooling Fan"
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-6006): qty=2, valid_from=2025-08-27

— Carol

subject: CI pipeline collab ends; start release automation
body:
CI pipeline effort is complete; moving to release automation.

Graph-impact:
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Bob↔Ivan "CI pipeline"): valid_to=2025-08-27
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Bob↔Ivan): context="release automation", valid_from=2025-08-27

— Ivan

subject: Alice stepping back from day-to-day
body:
Erin will be the sole active manager for now.

Graph-impact:
- MANAGES(Alice→Apollo): valid_to=2025-08-28 (keep Erin active)

— Alice

subject: Increase Chassis Frame to 2
body:
We need a spare frame for testing.

Graph-impact:
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-2002): close previous (valid_to=2025-08-28)
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-2002): qty=2, valid_from=2025-08-28

— Dave

subject: Drop Apollo → Zephyr dependency
body:
We can remove the Apollo dependency on Zephyr; Hermes covers remaining needs.

Graph-impact:
- DEPENDS_ON(Apollo→Zephyr): valid_to=2025-08-29

— Ivan

subject: Temporary hold for compliance audit
body:
Place Apollo on hold for the afternoon during compliance checks.

Graph-impact:
- Project(Apollo): status=on_hold

— Erin

subject: Compliance cleared — back to active
body:
Audit passed.

Graph-impact:
- Project(Apollo): status=active

— Judy

subject: Start power budget audit with Frank
body:
Let’s pair on power profiling.

Graph-impact:
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Bob↔Frank): context="power budget audit", valid_from=2025-08-30

— Bob

subject: Adjust Fastener Pack to 30
body:
Consumption update: lower P-5005 qty from 50 to 30.

Graph-impact:
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-5005): close previous (valid_to=2025-08-31)
- HAS_PART(Apollo→P-5005): qty=30, valid_from=2025-08-31

— Erin

subject: QA collaboration with Carol on sensors
body:
Spinning up a QA track for sensor validation.

Graph-impact:
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Grace↔Carol): context="sensor QA", valid_from=2025-08-31

— Grace

subject: Eve joins (Firmware) + review with Bob
body:
Please add Eve as Firmware Engineer from 2025-09-01 and pair her with Bob for a short review cycle.

Graph-impact:
- WORKS_ON(Eve→Apollo): role=Firmware Engineer, since=2025-09-01, valid_from=2025-09-01
- COLLABORATES_WITH(Eve↔Bob): context="firmware review", valid_from=2025-09-01

— Alice
